title: By the Queene. The Queenes Maiestie, hearing credibly by report, that in some partes of her realme, her people and subiectes are, and of late haue ben vexed and molested, by certayne lewde persons, vnder pretence of executing of commissions for inquiries to be made, for lands concealed ...
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
publicationStmtPublisher: In Powles Churchyarde, by Richarde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Queenes Maiestie,
